# Changelog

All notable changes to `laravel-freekassa` will be documented in this file

## 3.0.0 - 2020-05-13

- support Laravel 7.*

## 2.0.0 - 2020-01-28

- support Laravel 6.*

## 1.0.4 - 2019-05-06

- add signature to pay url
- remove support older versions
- add support php 7.3
- add tests

## 1.0.3 - 2019-02-20

- add tests

## 1.0.2 - 2019-01-15

- fix validate request
- add more comments to methods

## 1.0.1 - 2019-01-15

- composer, minimum stability

## 1.0.0 - 2019-01-15

- initial release
